text: Irene Bedard (born July 22, 1967) is an American actress. She is perhaps best known for the role of Suzy Song in the 1998 movie Smoke Signals and for the voice of the main character in the 1995 animated Disney movie Pocahontas. She was chosen in 1995 as one of People magazine's '50 Most Beautiful People'. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Native American actors Category:American models
title: Irene Bedard
